description:
Quiet 1 bedroom apartment located in luxury complex. Queen size bed and couch for any additional guests. 2 Minute walk to J & M subway line. 1 minute walk to broadway featuring restraunts , cafes, shopping, grocery stores, banks, & Bus lines.

Parking on Street
Elevator in Building

Safe & secure building. Individual lock and key on bedroom door for extra security. 

My place is good for artists, adventurers, vacationers, and business travelers.
name: Cozy Apartment off J&M Subway Lines
review: We loved the place and the area. Really nice, clean, quiet. The view form the rooftop was pretty cool too. I would absolutely recommend and we will defiantly book again when in Brooklyn
